Array: Czy chcesz zobaczyć czołówkę rozdziału 2?
Tak
Nie
Nieeeeeee!
Spokojnie, proszę pani.
Będę miał oko na Shinozaki.
Dziękuję. Zaraz wracam...
Mam nadzieję, że z Nakashimą
wszystko w porządku...
Ten krzyk... dobiegł stąd...
Kishinumaaa!
Cholera...!
Co to za dym?
...Wynocha od tego stoiska, natychmiast!
Wzięła cię chrapka na fajeczkę...?
Eee... nic z tych rzeczy.
Czy nie ostrzegałem cię, co się stanie,
gdy znowu przyłapię cię na paleniu?
Wylecisz ze szkoły!
Przepraszam...
Okropny z ciebie dzieciak, wiesz o tym?
Po co w ogóle chodzisz do szkoły?
Heh...
Rodzice się go wyparli... Mieszka sam...
Żadnych kolegów... Wagaruje...
Nienawiść do szkoły nie daje ci przyzwolenia
na urządzanie bójek ani robienie wiecznych
problemów, kolego!
Przecież i tak nie chcesz tu być, co nie?
Czemu nie rzucisz tego w pizdu?
Nie pojmuję tego!
Przecież nie starasz się dostać na studia.
Z twoja sytuacją w domu taka myśl pewnie
nawet nie przyszła ci do głowy!
Aha...
Korci mnie spytać się twoich rodziców, co myślą
o posiadaniu w rodzinie takiego nieudacznika,
ale nigdy nie mieli okazji się tu pokazać.
Ani razu od pierwszej wywiadówki.
Ciekawe, czy byłoby im wstyd!
Haha... Powiedzmy, że moi rodzice nie są
ze mnie zbytnio dumni.
Ech, nie to miałem na myśli.
Mówię o całokształcie.
Po prostu nie z nich dobrzy rodzice.
Jeśli miałbym swoje dzieci, uwierz mi,
nie dawałbym im tyle luzu, co twoi dają tobie.
Problem tkwi w tym, że ludzie robią sobie dzieci
zdecydowania za wcześnie.
Zanim sami jeszcze nie przestaną być dziećmi,
to już myślą o własnym!
Nieodpowiedzialni rodzice wychowują
nieodpowiedzialne dzieci. Dlatego na tym świecie
jest tylu podobnych do ciebie gówniarzy!
(Przynajmniej w jednym ma rację...)
(Nie ma powodu, dla którego miałbym wciąż chodzić
do szkoły. To na poważnie mija się z celem)
(Ale zanim się stąd wyniosę,
spuszczę wpierdol temu dupkowi...)
Ludzie myślą, że dopóki opłacają szkołę i korki,
to są idealnymi rodzicami.
Kto by się spodziewał, że wcale tak nie jest!
Hahahaha... Hm? Co to za mina?
(Nigdy przedtem nie jebnąłem nauczycielowi.
Ech, no trudno... Kiedyś musi być ten
pierwszy raz...)
Panie Tsubota.
Hę? Czyżby to panienka przewodnicząca...?
O co kaman?
Wicedyrektor pana szuka.
Jest pan proszony do pokoju nauczycielskiego.
W porządku. Dzięki. Hm...?
Shinozaki, masz śliczne oczka, wiesz?
Zawsze takie wyraźne i skupione!
Hahahahaha...
Istny kąsek dla wuefisty.
Jeśli kiedykolwiek będziesz miała jakiś problem,
przyjdź do mnie, dobrze? Hahahahahaha...
Co za oblech...
...Współczuję.
Ty nie jesteś wcale lepszy.
Chciałeś mu przyłożyć, no nie?
Kiepsko byłoby zostać wydalonym ze szkoły
z powodu takiego żałosnego nauczyciela jak on...
I tak byś tego później żałował. Dobrze wiesz.
Nieważne jak bardzo upierdliwy potrafi być
i jakkolwiek miałoby się to skończyć...
...przeżyjesz, chłopie! Po prostu zaciśnij zęby
i wytrwaj do zakończenia szkoły!
Poważnie... chlip.
...? Cze... czemu płaczesz?
Ach...
Sorki. Bardzo łatwo mi się rozkleić przy takich
emocjonujących chwilach.
Jesteś Kishinuma z klasy 1-5, co nie?
No.
Jestem Shinozaki z klasy 1-3. Przepraszam...
że się tak wtrąciłam.
Ach, nie przejmuj się...
Na razie.
...Ej, kiedy powiedziałaś mu, że szuka
go wicedyrektor...
Hihi. Oczywiście, że naściemniałam.
...Hehe.
...Co się dzieje...? Nic nie widać...
Shinozaki! ...Pani Yui! Satoshi! Jest tam kto...?
Kurde... Gdzie ja, do cholery, jestem?
Czy to jakiś sen?
Nie mogę... się ruszyć...?! Czuję ściany!
Wylądowałem w jakiejś dziurze...?
Chrzęst, tsssss...
Uch! Tfu... Co do...? Kto...
Chrzęst, tsssss...
Fu... Pfu... Dość!
(Piach i żwir... z góry?)
Chrzęst, tsssss...
Dość...! Co jest, kurwa?! Ja tu jeszcze żyję!
Chcesz mnie udusić?! Gha!
Chrzęst, tsssss...
(Mam buzię pełną tego świństwa... Tfu, ghe)
Chrzęst, tsssss...
...estań... ghe... stań!
Chrzęst, tsssss...
(Tfu... Nie mogę... oddychać... Zdechnę... tu)
(...um... rę? Kto...? To jakaś... bzdura...)
Chrzęst, tsssss...
(Ej, nie róbcie jaj...! Dosyć! Ale mnie...
oczy napieprzają!)
Chrzęst, tsssss...
K... wa... Ghu...
Chrzęst, tsssss...
...khh... ghu... N i e . . .  m o . . .
Chrzęst, tsssss...
Te dzieci, jak my, są ofiarami tej szkoły...
Nie same mogą dłużej znieść tego cierpienia,
dlatego krzywdzą pozostałych poszkodowanych...
Rozpierająca rozpacz nie potrafi znaleźć stąd
ucieczki, więc błądzi po korytarzach.
Nie powinno nas tu dłużej być.
Zadbam o to, by wszyscy wrócili do swoich domów...
Błagam, uważajcie na siebie...!
— Ciąg dalszy w rozdziale 3 —
Ani drgnie.
Fiu...! Posprzątane. Bycie w komisji sportowej wcale
nie jest takie łatwe.
Bez zastanowienia zlecę chłopakom, by odwalili
czarną robotę...
...i pojutrze razem zorganizowali lekcję wspólnego
WF-u!
Hihi, dobrze im tak!
Jezu, ten Kishinuma...
Czy on nie wie, jaka jestem delikatna? Dotychczas
najcięższą rzeczą, jaką dźwigałam, były pałeczki.
A on oczekuje, że będę targać jakiegoś kozła...
Jejku... Mniam.
Naomi, wręcz nie mogę się napatrzeć na twoje
kształty...
Hę? Co...?
Mówię o twojej pupci!
C-co? Twoja jest słodsza i zgrabniejsza!
Moja jest pulchna jak u kaczuszki.
Co ty gadasz?! Masz biodra wręcz stworzone
do rodzenia dzieci! To dobra rzecz!
Znaczy to, że jak dorośniesz, bobasy będą z ciebie
wyskakiwać jeden po drugim!
Ach... może to i dobrze.
Hihi, jest w tobie ten matczyny potencjał, Naomi!
Masz niezłą rękę do dzieci.
Mhm, marzy mi się czwórka maluchów.
Dobrze jest mieć na siebie plan.
Hm?
Nie...
Nieee...
NIEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEE!!
Czy to nie... głos Nakashimy?
Krzyczała...!
Co mam robić? Nie mogę pozwolić, aby coś stało się
moim uczniom...
(Lecz przez samą myśl o tym, że coś przykrego
mogłoby spotkać moich najdroższych uczniów...)
(...napełniła mnie siła wprost gdzieś z żołądka)
(Powinnam zachować się jak prawdziwa dorosła)
(Odwagi, w imię nauki!)
Zardzewiałe wiaderko zawiera dziwaczną, żółtą ciecz.
— Sala lekcyjna 2A —
Drzwi przytwierdzone są do ram jak atrapa, nie
da się ich otworzyć.
— Sala lekcyjna 3A —
Zamknięte.
— Sala lekcyjna 3A —
Teraz drzwi są otwarte.
Ktokolwiek tu pozostał ma natychmiast stąd znikać,
gdyż tego, kto zdecyduje się tu zostać...
...dopadnie gorliwość, która niesie ze sobą
śmierć.
...Właśnie, mój Monet za niedługo straci jedno
ze swoich dziewięciu żyć z głodu...
— Sala lekcyjna 3A —
Zamknięte.
— Sala lekcyjna 3A —
Teraz drzwi są otwarte.
— Sala lekcyjna 2A —
Drzwi przytwierdzone są do ram jak atrapa, nie
da się ich otworzyć.
(Szczęk, szczęk)
...haaa, haaa, uch... ha, ha.
Shinozaki, wszystko gra. Uspokój się, proszę...
But...you heard it too...
...Outside... Her voice...
*wheeze* *shiver*
I did.
(I think...she's hyperventilating.)
(I'd give her a paper bag to breathe into...
but there aren't any around...)
(I guess all I can do is try to calm her breathing
before she passes out...)
It probably wasn't a real voice. I'm sure it just
sounded like one!
Maybe it was the building settling.
I'll go check it out, though, and see if I can
figure out what it was for sure.
You two stay right here, okay?
*gasp* *wheeze*
Ms. Yui, wait! Don't leave us!
Shinozaki...
Spokojnie, proszę pani. Będę miał oko na Shinozaki.
N-no dobrze...
...Or...better yet, how about I go take a look,
and you wait here?
Not a chance. Until I can verify everyone's
safety...
...I want to keep you two out of harm's way.
...Well...okay, I guess. Be careful, though.
Nieeeeeee!
Look, she'll be fine! Geez...
I'm counting on you, Kishinuma.
I'll be back in no time.
No problem.
(...I'm actually scared! My legs are even shaking.)
(I have no idea what's going on. My head is
spinning...I can't make sense of anything...)
(My chest hurts like my heart is encased in ice...)
(And I can't shake this dizziness...or this
nausea...)
The door is nailed shut, and the nails are hammered
in tight. It's not going to open through any normal
means.
Dyrektor szkoły, Takamine Yanagihori
Kreda jest miejscowo zmazana,
przez co tekstu nie da się dokładnie rozczytać...
[Heavenly Host Elementary - Notice to All Faculty
and Students] Due to the recent kidnappings, caution
is highly recommended during all daily activities.
...podjęcie natychmiastowych działań w celu
rozwiązania częstych przypadków porwań uczniów
i dzieci w szkole, w oparciu o ostatnie przypadki.
Półki wypełnione są po brzegi długimi,
czarnymi włosami...
From the windows, only a deep, immutable darkness
can be seen.
Haaa, haaa...
Ms. Yui... I wonder if Satoshi and the others are
safe...
They are. I'm sure of it.
Hmm? There's something here...
A crystal shining with a faint purple glow is
nestled amongst the debris on the ground.
Take it?
Tak
Nie
Acquired [Power Stone].
Ms. Yui?
I think...that really was a scream we heard...
...Hmm?
Did you find something?
Yeah. Some kind of gemstone lying on the ground.
Looks like a ruby...or...no, probably an amethyst?
Kishinuma, you can identify gemstones?
No, not really. Shinozaki's the one to ask for that
kinda stuff.
Is that so? Well...then maybe I should give it to
her...
Give it to Shinozaki
Keep it
I guess now's probably not the best time for that...
But will you take it, and give it to her once she's
calmed down a bit?
It might make her feel a little better.
No problem.
Handed over the [Power Stone].
...Nah, now's not the time for that...
I really do think that was Nakashima's voice we
heard, though.
I agree. And I'm going to try finding her.
But I need you to stay here with Shinozaki, okay?
Okay.
Whoa! Another earthquake!
...I think it's over...
Wh-What's wrong?
I just got a really bad feeling...
We've gotta go search for Ms. Yui.
What if she comes back while we're gone, and we
miss each other along the way?
We're going!
A-All right, all right already! But if we don't have
any luck finding her, let's just make sure we come
back to this room, okay?
*sniffle* *sob*
How about...we leave her a note?
Shinozaki, do you have anything I could write with?
I've got a pen...
But no paper, huh.
...Well, there's always the teacher's desk.
'Ms. Yui, we've gone to find you. If we pass each
other and you see this message, wait right here.
We'll be back.'
How's that?
Blunt. And kind of sloppy.
It's your fault we have to leave her a message at
all, you know.
But...she might be in trouble!
O-Okay, okay! Just...don't cry! We'll find her!
[Heavenly Host Elementary - Notice to All Faculty
and Students] Due to the recent kidnappings, caution
is highly recommended during all daily activities.

From the windows, only a deep, immutable darkness
can be seen.
Haaa, haaa...
The note to Ms. Yui is still here, untouched and
unaltered.
Looks like...she hasn't come back yet...
Can't believe she'd still be out looking for
Nakashima...
The door is nailed shut, and the nails are hammered
in tight. It's not going to open through any normal
means.
Use the Nail Puller?

Nie
Although successful in loosening every nail and
opening the door, the rusted old nail puller broke
apart in the process.

From the windows, only a deep, immutable darkness
can be seen.
The door seems affixed to the wall like a model.
It can't be opened.
The door seems affixed to the wall like a model.
It can't be opened.
A disturbingly large amount of human hair is crammed
into the cabinet, filling each shelf to overflowing.
Looking closely, there are an excessive number of
bugs excitedly scampering all over. The sight alone
is enough to make your skin crawl.
[Heavenly Post]
'Breaking News: Serial Kidnapping Ends In Murder'
Over the past month, numerous children have gone
missing within the town, and authorities quickly
turned to kidnapping as the most likely explanation.
Now investigators have located the whereabouts of
these children, and their findings are far worse
than anyone could've anticipated.
The bodies of the absconded youths were discovered
within the Heavenly Host Elementary School building
on September 18th, 1973 at around 7:00 PM.
Authorities further revealed that a male instructor
from the school was found with them, alive but near-
catatonic, holding a pair of bloodied scissors.
Each of the corpses appeared to have had its tongue
sev__ed and remove_________________ique mutilations
far too grot___________________g to describe.
(The page is torn at this point, and the bottom
half of the article is nowhere to be found.)
I heard something about this once before...
...but I never realized just how horrific an
incident it really was...
*slam*
[Heavenly Post]
'Breaking News: Serial Kidnapping Ends In Murder'
Over the past month, numerous children have gone
missing within the town, and authorities quickly
turned to kidnapping as the most likely explanation.
Now investigators have located the whereabouts of
these children, and their findings are far worse
than anyone could've anticipated.
The bodies of the absconded youths were discovered
within the Heavenly Host Elementary School building
on September 18th, 1973 at around 7:00 PM.
Authorities further revealed that a male instructor

...It's cold in here...
Not to mention dark, and scary...
Hey, Shinozaki...
Do you have any more of those candles, like the one
you lit during the ghost story?
I do.
How about we light one up and take a quick breather?
They give off...some heat, right?
Sure...
This candle of mine...really is kinda warm...
Yeah...it is.
Ach!
Heeyagh!!
Well, if it isn't the teacher. Are you all by
yourself?
Decided to stop shaking and shivering with the other
two back in 1-A, did you?
I'll have you know I heard one of my students
screaming, and have set out to find her.
I see. Regrettably...
...that won't be possible. This school exists in a
nexus where multiple dimensions overlap. It's but a
single closed space in a sea of closed spaces.
In other words, even though you may be in the same
school as your screaming student, you and she occupy
different dimensions.
Which means you two can never meet.
If one of you should die, perhaps your body or your
spirit may move from one space to another...or...
...maybe you can find some means of traversing the
planes freely, as 'they' do...
Consider this fair warning. Even if you should find
the exact spot from which your student's scream
emanated...
...she herself may not be there. And if she isn't...
there's not a thing you can do about it...
But...I heard her voice!
It is true that other children have been brought
here quite recently. Children who, by all
appearances, are indeed your students.
But as I suggested, time and space do not behave as
you'd assume here. They're...fragmented.
You say you heard a scream. That scream may have
taken place only a few minutes ago...
...or, perhaps...it occurred in another space many
hours previous...
It may even have been an echo from the future...
Who's to say?
Rrrgh...
With this phenomenon as it is, it's entirely
possible for two closed spaces to have some small
influence on one another, even when out of sync.
It doesn't matter. I can't just ignore that
agonizing scream and go on my merry way.
Step aside!
[Day duty: Yoshizawa／Azusa]
(Wh...What...?)
(The shelf feels like it's...gotten lighter...)
OW! ...Ooh...
*exhale*
*pant* *pant*
So you're...really, truly concerned about the safety
of your students, are you?
Of course I am!
But you're just their instructor, no? You have no
familial bond with any of them. You're not their
mother.
But they're my children!
I think I speak for every single one of us at
Kisaragi Academy...
...when I say that we love our children... We care
about them just as their parents do.
Never underestimate a teacher.
...Oo...kh...ulghh...
Now, answer me this! Your little rant earlier
suggested that more of my students are here than
the two I came with and the one I heard...
Is it true? Were the others brought here as well?
It is. Numerous corporeal entities joined us in
these closed spaces, all at the same time.
Counting you...I sensed the arrival of nine people.
(Oof... Ooooh...
My right arm...is definitely broken...)
(And...all this blood...)
(All those cutting implements on the shelf must have
done a number on my back...)
(I wonder how long...I was out for...)
(Shinozaki and Kishinuma must be worried. I need
to get back to the classroom...)
Step aside?! ...Why don't you fuck off...
you damned corporeal...
*gasp* ...An...earthquake?!
Eek!
From the windows, only a deep, immutable darkness
can be seen.
Ulgh! ...Urk...
In all the world, the most vile, untrustworthy
individuals of them all...are you schoolteachers.
All you care about is your own well-being!
You're not worried about your students. You're just
worried about being held responsible if something
should happen to them!
Ulgh... This really...really hurts...
You're all the same. Every last one of you!
...And I won't be taken in by your lies anymore!
(Taken in...?)
When you see a problem among your kids, you just
keep your distance...because you sure wouldn't want
to get involved! Have to keep up appearances, right?
You just pick out the 'problem children' and chip
away at them little by little until they either
drop out or get expelled!
You're not disciplining them...you're just raging
at them!
...That's...not...
I've never met a teacher who actually cared about
her students. Not once!
...You... You're...wrong...
Aaaaaaagh!! ...Ooh...
All of your students are destined to starve to death
in these godforsaken halls...if they don't succumb
to depression and kill themselves first!
There's no other possible outcome. They'll all die
meaningless deaths, just like I did!
And they sure won't be thinking about YOU when they
take their final breaths!
EEP! ...Oolgh...oof...unnnnnnggh...
Any last words, bitch?
I'll tell them to your students as I end their
miserable lives.
Oolh...oong...oomph...
...Spare...m...
Heh... Haha! HAHAHAHAHA!!
Come again?
...Spare...my...students...
What was that?!
Please! I don't care what happens to me...
Just please, spare their lives!
They're not your children. You're not their mother.
Are you really still pretending to care about them?
Filthy liar... Did you know? When you die in this
accursed place, you experience the pain you felt at
the moment of your death for all eternity!
And I'm going to crush you to dust. The pain must be
unbearable...unimaginable...and you're going to feel
that pain every moment of every day, forevermore...
*wheeze* *pant*
Ask me to spare YOU. It's what you really want,
isn't it? Be honest with me...and I'll consider
sparing your life.
Spare my students
Spare me
Don't you harm a hair on their heads, you hear me?!
Of course...I want you...to spare my life...but...
...if I can die in their places...then I'll do it...
gladly!
Tch. You are one stubborn little bitch.
Hng...oolph! ...Mrrrnnngg...
*rasp*
(This is excruciating... I think...my rib cage is
broken...)
(It feels like...someone's pushing this cabinet down
on top of me...with superhuman force...)
(I'm...losing... ...consciousness...)
Hahaha! Does it hurt? Aww, poor baby!
Your corpse will look just like a dead frog on the
side of the road!
(Every...body...)
(Live...)
(I love...you all...)
Meanwhile...

tools, chisels, etc. All appear unusually sharp.
With so many metal tools in one place, this cabinet
must be exceptionally heavy...
OW! ...Ooh...
*exhale*
*pant* *pant*

It is. Numerous corporeal entities joined us in

...Wh-what the hell...?
A rusted, blood-soaked nail puller is sitting on top

Acquired [Nail Puller].
Urk... He's looking right at me...
Don't let your gaze meet his!
Wh-What the...?!
The Power Stone in Yoshiki's pocket suddenly and
spontaneously shattered.
(I think...I just heard Ms. Yui's voice...)
('Did I save you?', she said. But...it couldn't
be...could it...?)
Chhlme...wifff...mhee...
Urk... He's looking right at me...
Don't let your gaze meet his!
Wh-What the hell kind of room is this?!
It's not like any classroom I've ever seen...
Hey...Shinozaki...?
My head...is splitting...
Are you... Are you okay?!
We shouldn't...be here...
We really...shouldn't be here...
It looks like there's something in here, though, in
the back...
It appears to be a control mechanism for some sort

— Wspomnienia ofiar — (1/5)
I ate my friend today.
What else was I supposed to do?
I was starving.
We both were. And there's no food here.
So we decided, together, that one of us should try
to live just a little bit longer.
If I ever get home, I'm supposed to tell all the
people waiting for us what happened.
We left it all up to a game of paper-scissors-rock.
Loser eats winner.
And I lost.
I felt her blood going down my throat, quenching my
thirst. And her meat was supple and satisfying.
But that blood and that meat was once my friend.
Up until just a few hours before, I'd been talking
with her.
As I feasted, I just kept thinking, this food used
to be a person. Before I tore it apart, it all
worked together to sustain a life.
And every time I thought about that, I just started
crying...and I couldn't stop.
I wanted some part of her to be with me even after
she died, so I decided to keep one of her eyeballs.
And I thought maybe I should write all of this down,
to help preserve some small portion of my sanity.
There are decaying skeletal remains here, about the

gone, so there are no means of readily identifying
gender on sight.
Fortunately, there's a student ID name tag next to
the body.

Before I died here...
...I searched high and low for any means of escape.
In the process, I learned that these closed spaces
were given the form of Heavenly Host Elementary
School through the sorrow and agony of its victims.
Victims of an incident that occurred thirty years
before our time.
Four children kidnapped, with broken bodies later
found in this very building. Those children are the
ones giving shape to this nexus.
The four kids pictured in that newspaper article...
It...sure seems like it...
Unfortunately, this place took its toll on me, and
I died before I was able to make my escape.
But the key seems to lie with those children. If
they can be put to rest, there just might be a way
out of here.
Without all that sorrow and agony to sustain them,
these closed spaces would start to break down...
All this pointless suffering would come to an end,
and we'd be released from this hell.
That's...my theory, anyway.
Yeah, but put them to rest? How the hell do we do

Give them closure, of course. What they lack is any

The one who killed them? ...Are you saying...?!

In addition to multiple broken bones all throughout
his head and neck, Yoshiki's rib cage shattered on
impact and pierced his lungs.
As he convulsed and writhed in an ever-growing puddle
of his own blood and internal fluids, his vision
hastily grew dark. The last thing he saw...
...was a figure with wide, empty eyes and an unnatural
smile stretched across the length of its face, rocking
slowly back and forth in admiration of its handiwork.
Ayumi was clearly very pleased with herself...

[Victim's Memoirs]
I've been searching every last corner of this school
building, trying to find a way of escaping with her.
But it's not happening. No matter how much we
struggle, only further misery awaits us.
I'm so unbearably thirsty...so hungry that it feels
like my stomach is eating itself...
And every moment, it gets worse. It's like a big,
black mass in front of me that's slowly closing
in. I can't keep ignoring it.
I've started talking to the eyeball in my hand,
to help stay focused and maintain my sanity.
Stop looking at me like that!
I swear, I'll find us a way out of here!
I have to make sure I tell your family what you did
for me...
There's a piece of scrap paper pinned to the wall.
You notice dark spots dotting the page, and realize
they're tear stains.
...Those who choose to ignore the darkness that
dwells in the hearts of man may be stuck forever
in a loop...
...For in this world, there are some truths that
simply must be known, no matter how disturbing...
But curiosity can be deadly, and other truths are
best left untold.
Beware the messages of the dead, for there be curses
among them. Curses that can crush even the strongest
wills, demolishing all semblance of reason.
If you wish to protect your sanity, take heed.
Do not let your curiosity get the better of you.
Do not read the Victim's Memoirs to their
conclusion.
